document.full_text: india said the killing of osama bin laden was a "victorious milestone" in the war against terrorism but urged the world to continue battling militancy, a statement from the foreign ministry said on monday.
document.title: india hails bin laden death, more needed to fight terrorism
lines_and_colors: india said the killing of osama bin laden was a "victorious milestone" in the war against terrorism but urged the world to continue battling militancy, a statement from the foreign ministry said on monday.
